name: gulp-preprocess
description: Gulp plugin to preprocess HTML, JavaScript, and other files based on custom context or environment configuration
author: Jason Sandmeyer

scripts.format: oxfmt --write package.json package-lock.json .oxlintrc.json index.js test/main.js .github/workflows/test.yaml README.md LICENSE.md
scripts.format:check: oxfmt --check package.json package-lock.json .oxlintrc.json index.js test/main.js .github/workflows/test.yaml README.md LICENSE.md
